posts.post_content:
I was the underbidder on this group and I'm hoping the winner sees this post.  I'd be interested in buying or trading for quite a few cards that came from this group.  I'd be interested in several of the Series 7 cards as well as the Series 3 orange borders and would be willing to pay over cost to get these.  

I don't need the Kelly Mascot though so I'm not out to try to snag that card at least :)

Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
